title: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Sphere of Influence – Ascension + 9 DLCs
body:
Nobunaga’s Ambition: Sphere of Influence – Ascension + 9 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Grand strategy, Isometric, 3D, Real-time, Turn-based
Companies: Tecmo Koei / Koei Tecmo
Languages: ENG/JAP/CHT
Original Size: 8.5 GB
Repack Size: from 3.2 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable)
  • Filehoster: 1fichier (Uploaded by Marty McFly, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors)

Fixed installer for Japanese/Chinese

You will need it ONLY if you want to install additional Chinese or Japanese localizations.

http://www107.zippyshare.com/v/gvFiUxsF/file.html

Old setup had those files mixed, sorry.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on NOBUNAGAS.AMBITION.Sphere.of.Influence.Ascension-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-nasoia.iso (9,120,112,640 bytes)
  • All DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Japanese and Chinese localizations
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 8.5 to 3.2~5.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5~11 GB

Game Description

The renowned historical simulation series returns with enhanced features in “Nobunaga’s Ambition: Sphere on Influence”. Take the role of the legendary Warring States Daimyo (Warlords) such as “Nobunaga Oda” and “Shingen Takeda” to work your way towards unification by making best use of domestic affairs, diplomacy and battles against the fierce Warlord neighbors.

The latest installment has numerous enhancements and features to it’s predecessor “Nobunaga’s Ambition: Souzou” by expressing the Warring era’s highlight, the “Battle of Sekigahara” in the highest quality ever to date in the franchise’s history. Also the numerous in game procedures required in making progress towards unification has seen a major revamp in all areas.

Game Features

  • Recreate the “Battle of Sekigahara” your way: Realistic as it gets, simultaneous strategy executions recreating a realistic battle condition. New systems are in place such as the “Alliance” command allowing you to join hands with other Warlords or “Corps under the command system” allowing you to take full control of the numerous unique Warlords under your command.
  • Command your troops on the ever changing battlefields: Battles has become more dynamic with new fields and situations being added requiring more tactical planning and troop controls than before.
  • New scenarios and “Sengoku Chronicle” creating a dynamic Warring State Era: 4 new scenarios tracing the historical facts are in place such as “Birth of Nobunaga” (1534), “Battle of Sekigahara” (1600) with New “Sengoku Chronicle” seeing over 500 Officers being added to the character listing.
  • New features based on player feedbacks: Enriched game play experience with an enhanced edit features, new objects and Imperial Diplomacy to name some additions from the strong requests from our fans!

DLCs included

  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 1 “Stronger Than a Alliance”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 2 “God of War Descends”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 3 “Dawn of Revolution”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 4 “Fateful Clash”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 5 “Battle of Nagashino”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 6 “Battle of Itsukushima”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 7 “Battle of Tetorigawa”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 8 “The One-eyed Dragon”
  • NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: SoI – Scenario 9 “Shingen’s Final Step”
